patterns: What can you help me with?
responses: We provide customer support, product information, and service assistance.
Our services include support, inquiries, and issue resolution.
We are available from 9 AM to 6 PM, Monday to Friday.
Our working hours are 9 AM to 6 PM on weekdays.
You can contact our support team via email at support@example.com.
Please reach out to us at support@example.com for assistance.
Pricing depends on the service. Please contact support for detailed pricing.
Our pricing varies based on requirements. Reach out for a quote.
Refunds are processed as per our refund policy. Please contact support for details.
Our team will assist you with the refund process.

patterns: I want to report an issue
responses: We're sorry to hear that. Please describe your issue and we will assist you.
Your feedback is important to us. Kindly share more details.
